1.0.name: wordpress/keep-it-fresh
1.0.description: Keep it Fresh will stop WordPress from showing posts older than a set number of days or a specific date. It is configurable via the WordPress administration area. Keep it Fresh doesn't remove old posts, nor does it muck with their post_status; rather, Keep it Fresh uses the posts_where WordPress filter to filter out posts older than the given date or amount of days whenever WordPress requests posts outside of the admin area.
